ants.contrib.sklearn_interface package¶

Submodules¶

ants.contrib.sklearn_interface.sklearn_registration module¶

class ants.contrib.sklearn_interface.sklearn_registration.RigidRegistration(fixed_image=None)[source]¶

Bases: object

Rigid Registration as a Scikit-Learn compatible transform class

Example

>>> import ants
>>> import ants.extra as extrants
>>> fi = ants.image_read(ants.get_data('r16'))
>>> mi = ants.image_read(ants.get_data('r64'))
>>> regtx = extrants.RigidRegistration()
>>> regtx.fit(fi, mi)
>>> mi_r = regtx.transform(mi)
>>> ants.plot(fi, mi_r.iMath_Canny(1, 2, 4).iMath('MD',1))
fit(moving_image, fixed_image=None)[source]¶
inverse_transform(moving_image, fixed_image=None)[source]¶
transform(moving_image, fixed_image=None)[source]¶
